biotools.summary: A Cytoscape plugin for functional enrichment visualization. Gene-sets, such as pathways and Gene Ontology terms, are organized into a network (i.e. the ""enrichment map""). In this way, mutually overlapping gene-sets cluster together, making interpretation easier. It also enables the comparison of two different enrichment results in the same map.

bioschemas.name: Enrichment Map Cytoscape Plugin
bioschemas.summary: A Cytoscape plugin for functional enrichment visualization. Gene-sets, such as pathways and Gene Ontology terms, are organized into a network (i.e. the ""enrichment map""). In this way, mutually overlapping gene-sets cluster together, making interpretation easier. It also enables the comparison of two different enrichment results in the same map.
